obj/tools/ipt/

ipt_chisq.pro


Routines

top ipt_chisq

UTIL/NV/LIB/TOOLS/IPT

result = ipt_chisq(dxy, dtheta, fix, pts_dx, pts_dy, pts, axis, norm=norm)

Computes chi-squared value for given point fit parameters.

Return value

The chi-squared value is returned. STATUS: Completed.

Parameters

dxy in

Array (2) giving x- and y-offset solution.

dtheta in

Scalar giving theta-offset solution.

fix in

Array specifying which parameters to fix as [dx,dy,dtheta].

pts_dx in

Array (n_points) containing offset of actual point from predicted point in x.

pts_dy in

Array (n_points) containing offset of actual point from predicted point in y.

pts in

Array (2,n_points) of image coordinates corresponding to actual point.

axis in

Array (2) giving image coordinates of rotation axis in the case of a 3-parameter fit.

Keywords

norm in

If set, the returned value is normalized by dividing it by the number of degrees of freedom.

Author information

History:

Written by: Haemmerle, 12/1998
